title: Cybrize's Diana Kelley: Why compliance is more than a checkbox exercise, and how to integrate it into your security toolkit
description: Thomas chats with Diana Kelley, a true pioneer in cybersecurity and Chief Security Officer & Strategy Officer at Cybrize, about the challenges of leading changes in security operations today.

title: What's new in Tines: March edition
description: Check out our most recent product updates!

title: Five questions with Rosie Halpin, Sales Engineer
description: Get to know Rosie Halpin, a sales engineer passionate about helping prospective customers leverage Tines to eliminate some of their most pressing challenges and achieve their business goals.

title: How Tines achieved SOC 2 compliance in record time, saving 250+ human hours
description: With two automation Stories, our IT team achieved SOC 2 compliance in record time — cutting overall effort by 250 hours and completing the entire process within four months.

title: Lacework's Andreas Schneider: How to adapt as a CISO and the value of security failures
description: In this episode of the Future of Security Operations podcast, Thomas interviews Andreas Schneider - the Field CISO EMEA at Lacework.

title: GitHub’s Jacob DePriest: How to attract and retain more diverse security talent
description: On this episode of the Future of Security Operations podcast, Thomas speaks with Jacob DePriest, VP & Deputy Chief Security Officer at GitHub.

title: It’s time to rethink how we market and sell security products
description: As organizations seek better ways to protect against attacks, let’s seek better ways to improve the cybersecurity community as well.
